column4: hello... i am running ubuntu 10.10 (a customized stripped down edition).. i would like to install gnome 3, but without any extra program/app  in order to keep the 'stripped down' feature.. could someone tell me which package should i download in order to achieve that?
you'd need a ppa and I don't know if it supports 10.10
bazhang, epod thanx for the answer.. it means that i should update though the stripped down thing really workd for me... thanx for you quick replies
np.  I know there's a gnome3 ppa for 11.10
